column5: What a season fishing on Lake Ont & Lake Erie with double digits on fish every trip is maken for a awesome summer with all the scare of VHS everyone was thinking things were going to go for the worst but not once this season have i seen a sick fish all very healthy and loads of fat in there belly's and loads of food ...lake Ont has been tough finding the big kings the past few trips but still some nice kings bows & laker's ...been fishing deep water 250 to 356 fow running 3 riggers all in the top 55 fow water column using spoons and spin doctors ...and dipsys back 120 to 200 on a 3 setting .. as for Walleye they are now heading off Port Maitland to deeper water like 72 to 85 fow has been hot ...me myself never run riggers for Eye's i run a 10 to 16 rod program with all Dipsy's usually 2 #1 dipsys of the back corners off the boat Back 106 to 150 on a 2 setting and #0 Dipsy's 150 to 250 back on a 2 setting with 3 to 4 rods off each planner board . seems dark colors have been hot for me but as the day goes on changes have been made out through the day ...if your looking for a good feed of walleye nows the time to get out and get them ... Fishmaster Ultimate Charter's http://www.mountaincable.net/~fishmaster Couple days out with Friends     Walleye Trip  Bow Fishing  Walleye Trip

Well like i said before steve..!!!!!..you have had an incredible fishing season so far with great sucess,for walleyes  & great lakes trout and salmon....keep those reports & pics comming man,i love reading your lake erie posts....cheers bud
Nice report Steve!...seems as though one OFC member is a permanent fixture upon your boat! She like the boat mascot or something? LOL!  Thanks for sharing.  Gerritt.
Looks like people are getting their moneys worth and then some! Good job!
Awesome fishing, and always a pleasure to fish with you Steve... Thanks for taking the boys and I out!  Cheers,  Jen
You just wish you had a hot mate like me ...LOL

LOL no doubt!... I wonder though... I might have to upgrade my boat however...... with the brother-in-law and myself on board there is no more room available!.....  Unless my BIL becomes my boats mascot...... god help me!   Gerritt.
